scripts.build: rm -rf ../static && spago build && npm run build-player && npm run build-remote
scripts.build-player: spago bundle-app --main Main --to build/index.js && parcel build static/index.html --no-cache --dist-dir ../static --public-url assets
scripts.build-remote: spago bundle-app --main Remote --to build/remote.js && parcel build static/remote.html --no-cache --dist-dir ../static --public-url assets
